comment.author: 10918952@N08
comment._content: what is exactly is a bathing hut ?

comment.author: 65905566@N02
comment._content: There is an explanation of bathing huts here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bathing_machine They are a mobile changing room that is rolled right into the water.

comment.author: 53769726@N04
comment._content: The idea was so proper Victorian Ladies could change and go in and out of the water without having to parade across the beach displaying their "Limbs" in the revealing (When compared to the voluminous dresses they wore back then), bathing suits

comment.author: 32897063@N02
comment._content: Carter's little liver pills, United States of America, former colony; pills are akin to Beecham's pills in United Kingdom, which kingdom is nothing today compared to when Beecham's were big in UK in nineteenth centry.  1http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beecham's_Pills
